content.text:
[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519)

Yeah, I don't *think* I'd mind the width but that's a good observation. I'd love to see photos with other objects for scale.

[@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519)

> but can it form a mesh network and gossip text messages between other wiphones?-

I'd imagine so -- [their website](hkd.wiphone.io) advertises a [LoRa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LoRa) daughterboard, I think the trick would be implementing Scuttlebutt in Arduino/MicroPython.
